backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core types (Report, Activity, UserProfile, etc.) and backend logic for a museum monthly reporting system, including storage, authorization, and user approval mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three feature IDs (approve report button, activity fields restoration, app crash fix) to their relevant frontend files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details, serving as a reference for build planning and code navigation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, sidebar, charts, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Museus Centro – Relatório Mensal Individual 2026', mounting the app at the root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that sets up TanStack Router with all routes, authentication guard via Internet Identity, profile setup modal, pending approval screen, and a sidebar layout wrapping all pages.
frontend/src/components/ActivitiesList.t: React component that fetches and displays a list of activity cards for a given report, with status/classification badges, edit navigation, and an 'Add Activity' button shown based on user role and report status.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalDetailVi: Displays a detailed view of a report for review, allowing coordinators/admins to approve, request adjustments, or reject it with optional comments and a signature canvas.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Activi: Renders a bar chart showing activity counts per museum using Recharts, with truncated labels and color-coded bars.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Audien: Renders a pie chart breaking down audience counts by demographic profile (children, youth, adults, elderly, PCD) using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPICar: A styled card component for displaying a single KPI metric with a title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and color variant.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Renders a Recharts line chart showing monthly audience evolution, sorting and mapping month keys to Portuguese abbreviations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Planne: Renders a grouped bar chart comparing planned (quantitative goal) vs achieved results for goal-linked activities.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Public: Dashboard card that displays total general audience with selectable period modes (specific month, cumulative, or custom range), fetching data via useGetTotalGeneralAudience.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Report: Renders a bar chart of report counts per month, sorted by a fixed month order with a custom tooltip.
Renders a bar chart of report counts per museum, truncating long museum names and showing full names in a custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/ExportConsolidat: Renders a button (visible only to admins) that exports all reports and activities as a consolidated CSV/Excel file using a utility generator.
frontend/src/components/ExportReportPDFB: A button component that triggers PDF generation for a single report and its activities using the pdfGenerator utility.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that renders the Sidebar alongside a main content area using TanStack Router's Outlet, gating sidebar approval state from a query.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for first-time users to set their name and access role (professional, coordination, or administration) before using the app.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar that filters visible menu items based on the user's role and approval status, and provides a logout action.
A canvas-based signature input component supporting mouse and touch drawing, exposing imperative handles to retrieve the signature as base64, clear it, or check if it's empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the backend actor, covering user profiles, reports, activities, dashboard data, and audience queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts (Inter, Plus Jakarta Sans), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including colors, sidebar, and radius variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityFormPage.tsx: Full-featured form page for creating and editing activities, with fields for status, classification, goals, accessibility, evidence, audience, and file uploads, using React state and custom query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalsPage.tsx: Page for coordinators to review and approve submitted monthly reports, with search/filter controls by status and month, and a slide-in detail view for individual reports.
frontend/src/pages/ConsolidatedMuseumPag: Page that aggregates and displays activity and report data for a selected museum, month, and year, with options to export consolidated PDF and CSV reports.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing KPI cards and charts for reports and activities, with museum/month filters and an XLSX export button, visible to coordinators.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with Internet Identity authentication, displaying the Museus Centro branding, project description, and a login button with loading state.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Displays a waiting screen for users whose accounts are pending coordinator approval, with options to resend the approval request or log out.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFormPage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing monthly reports, supporting tabs for form fields and activities, with signature capture and submit/save actions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsListPage.tsx: Lists reports for the current user with status badges, and provides actions to create, edit, delete, or add activities to reports based on user role and ownership.
frontend/src/pages/UserManagementPage.ts: Admin page for managing user profiles, allowing coordinators to approve/reject pending users and edit or delete existing user roles and museum assignments.
frontend/src/utils/audienceValidation.ts: Exports a utility function that validates audience demographic breakdowns do not exceed the reported total audience count.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedCsvGenera: Generates and triggers download of a consolidated CSV file combining report metadata and their associated activities, with localized Portuguese labels.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedPdfGenera: Generates a consolidated PDF report for multiple reports and their activities, aggregating totals for audience, activities, and hours, and rendering them as styled HTML printed via the browser.
frontend/src/utils/excelGenerator.ts: Exports multiple reports and their associated activities as a CSV file with Portuguese-language headers and localized label mappings for status, classification, and museum location.
frontend/src/utils/labels.ts: Centralized utility module that provides Portuguese label mapping functions and constants for all backend enums including MuseumLocation, Month, Status, ActivityStatus, Classification, and others.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates a single-report PDF by building an HTML string with activity details and report metadata, then triggering a browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH, fonts, shadows, border radii, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for the 'Museus Centro' web app, documenting existing features, pending action requests (approve report button, activity restoration), known issues, and architectural notes at schema version 1.0.0.
